overview: “Irv is the Vice President, Platform. Prior to joining Mozes, Irv led product strategy and development efforts for internet-based applications at Adobe. He was responsible for emerging technologies including mobile authoring and web-based services. Prior to Adobe, Irv held senior product marketing, and management roles at HigherMarkets, later acquired by SciQuest. Irv has also worked as an information technology and business consultant with Arthur Anderson and Ernst & Young. He holds an MBA from the Haas School of Business at the University of California, Berkeley and a BS in Mechanical Engineering from University of Waterloo.” (Source: Mozes)
